sendEmail

void sendEmail(java.lang.String message)
               throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Sends a single part message using to, from subject attributes defined in the Emailer component

Parameters:
message - Message body
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - if any error while sending the email
java.rmi.RemoteException - if any rmi or network error

sendEmail

void sendEmail(java.lang.String subject,
               java.lang.String message)
               throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Sends a single part message using to, from attributes defined in the Emailer component

Parameters:
subject - The subject text that overrides the default value
message - Message body
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - if any error while sending the email
java.rmi.RemoteException - if any rmi or network error

sendEmail

void sendEmail(java.lang.String to,
               java.lang.String cc,
               java.lang.String from,
               java.lang.String subject,
               java.lang.String message)
               throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException,
                      java.rmi.RemoteException
Sends a single part message.

Parameters:
to - comma separated list of email ids
cc - comma separated list of email ids
from - from address
subject - The subject text that overrides the default value
message - Message body
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - if any error while sending the email
java.rmi.RemoteException - if any rmi or network error
